charges.charge_description: 18:1341 Postal, Interstate Wire, Radio, Etc.; Devise A Scheme to Defraud And Obtain Money Through U.S. Mail (1)

charges.charge_disposition: 3 Years Probation as to Each of Counts 1 And 2 to Run Concurently; The First 30 Days of Probation Shall be Spent in Community Confinement; $1,000 Fine; $60,000.00 Restitution And $100.00 Special Assessment; Deft Shall Contribute 2,000 Hours of Community Service During Probation

charges.charge_description: 18:1343 Postal, Interstate Wire, Radio, Etc.; Devise A Scheme to Defraud And Obtain Money by Means of Wire Communication in Interstate Commerce (2)

charges.charge_disposition: 3 Years Probation as to Each of Counts 1 And 2 to Run Concurently; The First 30 Days of Probation Shall be Spent in Community Confinement; $1,000 Fine; $60,000.00 Restitution And $100.00 Special Assessment; Deft Shall Contribute 2,000 Hours of Community Service During Probation
